responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "7574730E4A897B518D9198A115124A79", "The Clockwork Codex was created by the legendary Dunir inventor, Olek Bellsong in the 2nd Age 2570. It is a unique mechanism that employs advanced engineering and applied magic to create an automated library. Nearly 400 tomes have been stored in codex crystals. With the specialized Codex Key, patrons can access the interface and request information on any of the topics stored within the crystals. While it is a wondrous machine, Bellsong has been unsuccesful in reproducing its intricate design and applied magic theories.")
name: MIDD_0015_PTS_ClockworkCodex_10
